name: AgileBen JIRA Filter Forecaster
description: Adds an Analyse button to Jira filters.  Uses python and bokeh library to do charting and forecasting.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' https://code.jquery.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.datatables.net; img-src 'self' data: https://cdn.datatables.net; object-src 'none'; connect-src 'self' https://pypi.org https://files.pythonhosted.org http://127.0.0.1:3000 https://*.atlassian.net
